betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThis pack has hidden recipes that can be figured out through clues hidden in various worldgen structures! 

Here is your first puzzle! It won't be useful till later, but it'll help you get an idea on what puzzles consist of!

§fThe testificates hold some secrets, that's undeniable. They seem to appreciate intelligence, and they are willing to appreciate effort to uncover said secrets. Something good will come out of this, I can feel it!
